vocabinfos.relatedNos: [{'strongNumber': 'H8110B', 'matchingForm': 'שִׁמְרוֹן', 'stepTransliteration': 'shim.ron', 'gloss': 'Shimron', '_searchResultRange': 'Gen.46.13-1Chr.7.1', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '伸崙', '_es_Gloss': 'Simrón', '_zh_Gloss': '伸仑'}, {'strongNumber': 'H8112', 'matchingForm': 'שִׁמְרוֹן מְראוֹן', 'stepTransliteration': 'shim.ron me.r.on', 'gloss': 'Shimron-meron', '_searchResultRange': 'Josh.12.20@Josh.11.1-19.15', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '伸崙米崙', '_es_Gloss': 'meron', '_zh_Gloss': '伸仑米仑'}]
vocabinfos.mediumDef:
Also named: shim.ron me.r.on (שִׁמְרוֹן מְראוֹן "Shimron-meron" H8112)
§ Shimron = "watch-height"
n pr loc
a Canaanite royal city allotted to Zebulun
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
伸崙 这个字在希伯來文的意思是 "守望高處"
陽性專有名詞
1) 以薩迦的第四個兒子, 和伸崙族的祖先
專有地名詞
2) 迦南王屬城被分配給西布倫
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
伸仑 这个字在希伯来文的意思是 "守望高处"
阳性专有名词
1) 以萨迦的第四个儿子, 和伸仑族的祖先
专有地名词
2) 迦南王属城被分配给西布伦

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Issachar living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Gen.46.13;
son of: Issachar (H3485);
brother of: Tola (H8439), Puah (H6312) and Jashub (H3437H)
Also named: shim.ro.ni (שִׁמְרֹנִי "Shimronite" H8117)
§ Shimron = "watch-height"
n pr m
4th son of Issachar and the progenitor of the family of Shimronites
